name: Zantek Information Technology
description:
Zantek Information Technology is an IT company that assists their customers in solving business issues through effective solutions and proper use of their technology. Through their team of competent professionals, they create competitive advantages, establish clear a view of their business, and mitigate technology risks, allowing their customers to focus on their core business processes.
They have partnerships with industry-leading suppliers to assure their solutions meet the needs of their clients.
